nodes.text: Palo Pevv was a Sullustan male who worked as a treasure hunter during the Cold War. He could be frequently found in the Drunkard's Vote cantina in Coruscant's Senate Commercial District.
Palo Pevv appears in the 2011 BioWare massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a skill trainer for Treasure Hunting on Coruscant.
